title: Rara Mutton Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: This Himachali dish is popularly enjoyed during special events and festive occasions. Prepared with a mélange of classic Indian spices, this soulful red mutton curry shall make your mouth water.

recipe_directions.1: To begin making the Himachali Mutton Rara recipe, In a wide pan, dry roast all the garam masala ingredients except the nutmeg and grind them into a powder using a mixer grinder
recipe_directions.2: Mix nutmeg powder in this mixture and keep it aside. Heat mustard oil in a heavy bottomed pan to smoking point and cumin seeds
recipe_directions.3: Add chopped onion, green chillies, garlic and ginger and saute for 10 minutes
recipe_directions.4: Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder and mix it properly. Add tomatoes,salt and sugar
recipe_directions.5: Let it cook for 15 to 20 minutes on medium flame till tomatoes are soft and the oil has risen to the top. Sprinkle little water. Now mix mutton and let it cook for 20 to 25 minutes till it is rich and fully coated with all spices
recipe_directions.6: Add ghee for the flavours. Cover the pan with a lid and let the mutton cook in its own juices for about 30 to 45 minutes
recipe_directions.7: Half way through, sprinkle 1 big tablespoon freshly grounded garam masala. Once the mutton is tender, add some chopped coriander, lime juice and serve hot
recipe_directions.8: Serve Himachali Mutton Rara along with hot steamed

recipe_ingredients.name: Coriander (Dhania) Leaves , Few sprigs, finely chopped

title: Mutton Akbari Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description:
Mutton Akbari Recipe: Mutton Akbari is a delicious mutton curry and you can make curry for lavish dinner.Total Cook Time 25 mins Prep Time 10 mins Cook Time 15 mins Recipe Servings2EasyIngredients of Mutton Akbari1 Tbsp Ghee  1 tbsp Oil Salt (as required)500 gram Mutton (cooked)1 tbsp Ginger-Garlic Paste2  Tomatoes 3  Green Chillies 3 tbsp Curd  1/2 tsp Turmeric Powder 1 tsp Chaat Masala Powder 1 tsp Black Pepper Powder 1 tsp Red Chilli Powder 1 tsp Garam Masala Powder1 tsp Red Chilli Flakes Water (as required)  Lemon JuiceHow to Make Mutton AkbariHideShow 
                                            Media
                                        1.Heat ghee in a pan, add boiled mutton, ginger garlic paste and season it with salt.  Fry the mutton till it brown.2.Add chopped tomatoes and green chilles. Once the tomatoes are nice and mushy, pour in the curd. keep stirring the curd to prevent it from curdling.3.Next, add turmeric powder, chat masala, pepper powder, red chilli powder, garam masala and red chillies flakes.4.Pour water and lemon juice. Cover the pan, once the gravy is combined, the dish is ready!Key Ingredients: Ghee  , Oil Salt (as required), Mutton (cooked), Ginger-Garlic Paste, Tomatoes , Green Chillies , Curd  , Turmeric Powder , Chaat Masala Powder , Black Pepper Powder , Red Chilli Powder , Garam Masala Powder, Red Chilli Flakes Water (as required), Lemon Juice
                                        Tags:
                                    MuttonAkbari5 Share Recipe Share Recipe Facebook
                 Twitter
                 Reddit
                 
                    Snapchat

recipe_directions.1: Heat ghee in a pan, add boiled mutton, ginger garlic paste and season it with salt.  Fry the mutton till it brown
recipe_directions.2: Add chopped tomatoes and green chilles. Once the tomatoes are nice and mushy, pour in the curd. keep stirring the curd to prevent it from curdling
recipe_directions.3: Next, add turmeric powder, chat masala, pepper powder, red chilli powder, garam masala and red chillies flakes
recipe_directions.4: Pour water and lemon juice. Cover the pan, once the gravy is combined, the dish is ready!

title: Badam Gosht Korma Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description:
Badam Gosht Korma  Recipe: This is a delicious curry which is made by almond, curd and whole spices. This curry is perfect for your next dinner party.Total Cook Time1 hr  Prep Time 15 mins Cook Time 45 mins Recipe Servings2EasyIngredients of Badam Gosht Korma1/2 Kg mutton1 cups almonds2 large onions chopped and fried crisp 4 tbsp curd4 tbsp ghee1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste 1 tbsp coriander powder1 tbsp red chili powder 1/2 tsp turmeric powder  Salt as required1  cinnamon stick2  bay leaves 4-5  green cardamom 1  black cardamom 3-4 drops   kewra/rose waterHow to Make Badam Gosht KormaHideShow 
                                            Media
                                        1.Wash and soak almonds in hot water for 10 minutes. Peel off the skin and take half the almonds and curd and make a fine paste. Keep it aside.2.In a pan add ghee and whole spices, once they start to splutter, add mutton and fry until the mutton has changed color.3.Now add ginger garlic paste and cook until the raw smell is gone.4.Once the ginger-garlic paste and mutton has mixed well, add coriander, cumin, red chili and turmeric powder, salt and mix well.5.After around 2 mins add the curd and almonds paste and cook until the masala starts leaving oil.6.Next add the crushed fried onions and mix well for some time. Once the masala looks cooked, add around 2cups water and leave it to simmer for almost 30 minutes in medium fame with the lid on.7.Check once if the mutton pieces are soft. Now add the remaining almonds and cook for 2 more minutes. End with adding either kewra or rose water and let it sit with the lid on for 2 minutes.8.Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.Key Ingredients: mutton, almonds, onions chopped and fried crisp , curd, ghee, ginger-garlic paste , coriander powder, red chili powder , turmeric powder, Salt as required, cinnamon stick, bay leaves , green cardamom , black cardamom ,  kewra/rose water
                                        Tags:
                                    BadamKorma5 Share Recipe Share Recipe Facebook
                 Twitter
                 Reddit
                 
                    Snapchat

recipe_directions.1: Wash and soak almonds in hot water for 10 minutes. Peel off the skin and take half the almonds and curd and make a fine paste. Keep it aside
recipe_directions.2: In a pan add ghee and whole spices, once they start to splutter, add mutton and fry until the mutton has changed color
recipe_directions.3: Now add ginger garlic paste and cook until the raw smell is gone
recipe_directions.4: Once the ginger-garlic paste and mutton has mixed well, add coriander, cumin, red chili and turmeric powder, salt and mix well
recipe_directions.5: After around 2 mins add the curd and almonds paste and cook until the masala starts leaving oil
recipe_directions.6: Next add the crushed fried onions and mix well for some time. Once the masala looks cooked, add around 2cups water and leave it to simmer for almost 30 minutes in medium fame with the lid on
recipe_directions.7: Check once if the mutton pieces are soft. Now add the remaining almonds and cook for 2 more minutes. End with adding either kewra or rose water and let it sit with the lid on for 2 minutes
recipe_directions.8: Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot

recipe_ingredients.name: large onions chopped and fried crisp

title: Saag Gosht Recipe
author: Harangad Singh
description: Saag Gosht is lip-smacking curry of juicy and succulent mutton pieces cooked with coarsely pureed spinach and some aromatic spices. It is best served with chapati, naan or even tandoori roti. You can also pair it up with rice.

recipe_directions.1: Heat three tablespoons olive oil in a pan, add ginger, garlic and onion and sauté for two to three minutes
recipe_directions.2: Add mutton pieces and cook it for 3-4 mins or till the meat will be seared then add roughly chop mustard leaves
recipe_directions.3: Cover and cook it till mutton gets tender
recipe_directions.4: Add roughly chop spinach and stir
recipe_directions.5: Add chopped green chillies. Add salt to taste and stir well
recipe_directions.6: Ready to serve!

title: Lahori Mutton Karahi Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: Made in a thick gravy of tomato and onions, the dish is perfect to pair with some rich buttery naan or parathas.

recipe_directions.1: Wash and dry mutton chunks, add garlic paste and let it sit for some time
recipe_directions.2: In a karahi, heat oil and add cinnamon stick and cloves. Next add the mutton and fry for around 10 mins or until the colour has changed. Add ginger paste and chillies and keep frying
recipe_directions.3: Add coriander powder, red chilli powder and haldi, some salt and keep frying
recipe_directions.4: After the mutton is slightly cooked, add in the mix of tomato and onion puree and mix well. Keep cooking until the masala leaves oil
recipe_directions.5: Now add some water and cover and cook until soft and tender. Check for salt and adjust accordingly
recipe_directions.6: Take off the heat, garnish with ginger juliennes and serve hot

title: Keto Butter Chicken Recipe
author: Dr Shunmukha Priya
description: About keto butter chicken : This keto friendly butter chicken recipe is just the right thing if you want something healthy yet delicious. Here creamy gravy is subtly laced with chicken chunks and desi spices.

recipe_directions.1: In a bowl add turmeric Powder, Chilli Powder, Coriander powder and mix well
recipe_directions.2: Marinate the chicken in this powder and keep for 15 mins
recipe_directions.3: In a pan, heat the avocado oil, once it's hot, pan fry the chicken for 5 minutes on both sides till it gets fully cooked
recipe_directions.4: In a pan, heat the butter and on melting, add tomato puree and mix well. Add kasuri methi, water and cover with a lid and cook for 5 minutes
recipe_directions.5: Once tomato puree and oil get split, add heavy cream to this and mix well till everything has emulsified
recipe_directions.6: Add the prepared chicken to this, add pepper powder and salt, mix well and cover for a min on a low flame
recipe_directions.7: Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve with Rice /Roti

title: Nilgiri Turkey Korma Recipe
author: Chengfeng
description: About Nilgiri Turkey Korma Recipe: A luscious, creamy turkey korma, made with a melange of spices along with coconut paste and curd.This is a perfect dish to prepare for your next dinner party!

recipe_directions.1: In a cooker, add turkey meat, salt, turmeric powder and water
recipe_directions.2: Cover with lid and boil it allowing 2 whistles. When the turkey is boiled then put it aside
recipe_directions.3: In a mixer jar, add spinach leaves, mint leaves, coriander leaves, green chilli, little water and grind it into a fine paste
recipe_directions.4: In a pan, add oil, then add shahi jeera, chopped onions, ginger garlic paste, and fry for 5 minutes
recipe_directions.5: Add boiled turkey meat pieces and mix well. Add fresh curry leaves and mix well. Cook for 10 minutes
recipe_directions.6: After 10 minutes, add coconut paste and mix well. Oil will ooze out
recipe_directions.7: Add curd, salt to taste, grounded spinach paste and mix well for 5 minutes. Fry until aromatic
recipe_directions.8: Add 1 glass of water and mix well, then add coriander powder and mix again
recipe_directions.9: Cover with lid to boil the turkey meat for 10 minutes
recipe_directions.10: After 10 minutes, open the lid and stir well
recipe_directions.11: When curry is almost done, add garam masala powder and stir. Add fresh coriander leaves, put in a serving bowl, and serve hot

title: Laal Maas Recipe
author: Ashish Roy
description: About Laal Maas Recipe: Laal Maas is a Rajasthani dish, fiery as ever, that you simply shouldn't miss! Here's a laal maas recipe packed with red chillies that you can try at home.

recipe_directions.1: Heat oil in a non-stick pressure cooker, to that add black cardamom, green cardamoms, cinnamon, cloves, whole mathania (red chilli) and bay leaf and sauté till its fragrant
recipe_directions.2: Add the onions and sauté till they turn light brown in colour. Then add the remaining ginger garlic paste and sauté for 5 minutes
recipe_directions.3: Add the lamb pieces to the onions and sauté on high heat for 10-15 minutes until the meat is seared properly
recipe_directions.4: Add turmeric powder, mathania (red chilly) paste, salt and sauté for 10 minutes
recipe_directions.5: Whisk the yoghurt and add into lamb and sauté on medium flame for 10 minutes, then keep it on simmer (slow flame) and let the mutton cook slowly.  Add little water or stock if required at any stage. Adjust seasoning
recipe_directions.6: Once the lamb is cooked, transfer to a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprigs and a lemon wedge. Serve hot

title: Lauki Gosht Recipe
author: Mohammed Nafeesh - Courtyard Bengaluru Outer Ring Road
description: A delicious combination of Lauki and Mutton comes alive in the form of this spicy, aromatic dish of Lauki Gosht.

recipe_directions.1: Wash and peel the Lauki. Cut in to halves and wash and then keep a side
recipe_directions.2: Heat oil in a wok and add cinnamon stick, black cardamom and finely chopped onions, fry onions till golden brown
recipe_directions.3: Add the meat and sauté. Add ginger garlic paste and mix
recipe_directions.4: Add coriander, turmeric, red chilli powder along with salt and fry all of these spices
recipe_directions.5: Add chopped tomatoes and cook, followed by lauki and continue cooking with little water
recipe_directions.6: Let it simmer until the mutton is cooked
recipe_directions.7: Now add water depending on how thin you want the gravy
recipe_directions.8: Serve garnished with fresh coriander leaves

title: Steamed Fish In Banana Leaves Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: If you love seafood, this recipe will definitely make you crazy.  Besides, it is easy-to-make, delicious and very apt for serving on occasions like birthdays, anniversaries, get-togethers and other parties.

recipe_directions.1: We first need to marinate the fish. For this, take a bowl, add fish chunks, lemon juice and salt. Keep it aside for 10 mins atleast
recipe_directions.2: Now, take a grinder, add coconut, coriander leaves, green chillies, garlic and cumin seeds to a fine paste
recipe_directions.3: Once done, wash banana leaves and pat try them. Spread it on the kitchen’s slab and put the marinated fish on top of it. Now spread the paste over it
recipe_directions.4: Fold the banana leaves neatly and steam them in a steamer with plenty of hot water
recipe_directions.5: Serve and enjoy!

title: Mango Phalsa Chaat Recipe
author: Rakesh Sethi
description: Mango Phalsa Chaat is ideal for the hot summers when all you need is a quick meal to nourish you from within. This simple chaat recipe is probably just the chaat recipe you need today!

recipe_directions.1: In a bowl combine diced mangoes with honey, salt, mint, chaat masala, lemon juice and chilli flakes
recipe_directions.2: Toss gently to mix all ingredients well
recipe_directions.3: Transfer to a serving glass and put phalsa berries all over the chaat. Garnish with mint sprig
recipe_directions.4: Serve and enjoy!

title: No Oven Garlic Bread Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: If you love garlic bread as much as we do, here we have something special for you. We have found one recipe for making restaurant-style garlic bread at home and that too without an oven.

recipe_directions.1: First of all, dissolve sugar in a quarter cup of lukewarm water, add yeast to it and mix it and keep it aside for some time
recipe_directions.2: Now take all purpose flour in a big bowl, add salt, garlic powder and oregano and mix it
recipe_directions.3: In this time the yeast will become fluffy, add it to the maida and mix it and knead a soft dough. Pour some oil on the dough and once again knead it and keep it aside
recipe_directions.4: The flour will get ready in 15 minutes. Grease your hands with oil and knead it again
recipe_directions.5: Now take out a portion from the dough, sprinkle some all purpose flour and roll it into a circular shape.  Add cheese and boiled corn to one side
recipe_directions.6: Apply oil on the edge and fold its other side. Apply a lot of butter on it with the help of a brush
recipe_directions.7: Sprinkle oregano, chili flakes and garlic powder on it and make light cuts
recipe_directions.8: Turn on the gas and place a pan on it. Put salt in the pan and heat it, keep a bowl or stand in the middle of it
recipe_directions.9: Place the prepared garlic bread on a baking tray and place it in a pan to be baked
recipe_directions.10: After placing the baking tray in the pan, put a lid on it and let it bake for 15 minutes. After this take out the baking tray and serve sliced

title: Chicken Doughnuts Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: The sweet classic doughnut gets a savoury twist with this recipe. These chicken doughnuts are made from a mixture of minced chicken, boiled potatoes, onions and carrots.

recipe_directions.1: Take chicken, garlic, bread crumbs, boiled potato, finely chopped onion, coriander leaves, grated carrot, chilli flakes, chilli powder, salt, cumin seed powder, black pepper powder into a blender jar. Blend these ingredients into a fine paste
recipe_directions.2: Grease oil on a plate and shape the chicken donuts paste into regular-sized flat balls
recipe_directions.3: Keep them in the freezer for 2-3 hrs. Later, cut a hole into the centre of those balls
recipe_directions.4: Now dip these doughnuts in all-purpose flour, egg and bread crumbs. And keep them in the freezer again for 1-2 hours
recipe_directions.5: Afterwards, heat oil in a pan and deep fry the chicken donuts. Once they are crispy and golden in colour, remove them and serve
recipe_directions.6: Your crispy chicken donuts/chicken rings are ready to serve

title: Protein Balls Recipe
author: Chengfeng
description: Spring is here, and it brings with it sweet tidings and hopes of a weekend resplendent with colors and delicious food and drinks to savour. On this occasion, here we bring you an exclusive recipe for a healthy snack ‘Protein Balls’.

recipe_directions.1: Place the almonds in a food processor and pulse until they are finely chopped
recipe_directions.2: Add the apricot, dates, honey and orange zest and pulse until a dough consistency is achieved. Roll one heaping teaspoon of dough into little ball then roll the ball through desiccated coconut. Set aside. Repeat until all the dough is used up
recipe_directions.3: The energy balls can be stored in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 1 week

title: Chicken And Baby Spinach Kebab Recipe
author: Dayashankar Sharma
description: We all love kebabs. They are super delicious and indulging to the core. To give kebab a nutritious twist, we have added baby spinach in this recipe. Try it out!

recipe_directions.1: Mix all above ingredients well and leave it in a bowl for 5 minute to integrate
recipe_directions.2: Heat vegetable oil in a deep pan and add chopped ginger, green chilli and brown for 2 minutes till finish crackling
recipe_directions.3: Add boneless chicken thigh and cook over high heat for 5 minutes and stir constantly, do not allow to stick at the bottom
recipe_directions.4: Add all crushed spices and powder spices and cook till the chicken is soft (cooked)
recipe_directions.5: Add chopped coriander, mint, coriander, spinach and mix well and remove the pan from fire and cool it
recipe_directions.6: When cold, Grind cooked mixture in Robot coup. Add bread crumb and taste the seasoning. (adjust according to taste). Make Patties according to the size as in the picture and leave in the fridge to firm up
recipe_directions.7: Heat very little oil in a none stick pan and grill the Patties (tikki) cook to golden brown
recipe_directions.8: Serve on appropriate plat with garnish of seasoned dollop of piped cream cheese on top and Mint chutney at the bottom

title: Golden Coin Eggs Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: Sliced boiled eggs in roundels, coated in corn starch and pan-fried in butter and ginger-garlic paste until golden brown. Top it with some chilli flakes and any sauce of your choice and make this quick recipe to impress your guests.

recipe_directions.1: Slice boiled eggs in roundels, coat them in corn starch
recipe_directions.2: Pan fry the coated eggs in butter, till they are golden brown on both side. At this stage, the eggs shall start looking like golden coins
recipe_directions.3: Next, add ginger-garlic paste to the pan and stir fry till paste cooks
recipe_directions.4: Add chilli flakes, tomato sauce, chilli sauce and soya sauce. You can also add sesame seeds of you want
recipe_directions.5: Season with salt and toss the eggs well. The golden coin eggs are ready!

recipe_ingredients.name: Eggs (hard boiled & shelled, slice them up into 1” roundels)
Water (as required, to boil the eggs)
To taste or 1tsp  Salt (to be used in two batches)

title: Eggs Benedict With Sesame Bagels Recipe
author: Aditi Handa
description: Breakfast heaven on a plate. Ever tried Eggs Benedict with Sesame Bagels? if not, read below.

recipe_directions.1: Combine peppercorns and 2 cups vinegar in a small saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook until reduced by half, about 30 minutes
recipe_directions.2: Remove from heat; discard peppercorns. Set aside 2 teaspoons vinegar reduction in a small bowl. Save the remainder in an airtight container for another use
recipe_directions.3: Bring 950 ml water to a simmer in a large saucepan over medium-low heat. Place a heatproof bowl on the pan. Add egg yolks and vinegar reduction; whisk constantly until it forms ribbons when the whisk is lifted
recipe_directions.4: Remove bowl from heat, and slowly whisk in ½ cup melted butter. Return bowl to saucepan and cook for 2 minutes, whisking constantly
recipe_directions.5:
Repeat process with remaining butter until hollandaise mixture reaches a consistency slightly looser than mayonnaise. Whisk in lemon juice, salt, pepper. Set
aside
recipe_directions.6: Boil 3 inches of water in a large saucepan over high heat; reduce heat to medium and maintain at a light simmer. Add remaining vinegar, and stir briskly to form a vortex
recipe_directions.7: Break 1 egg, and slip into the vortex. Simmer for 2 to 3 minutes, and remove with a slotted spoon. Repeat with the remaining eggs
recipe_directions.8: Spread a small amount of hollandaise on each bagel half; top each with 1 ham slice and 1 poached egg. Top with more sauce and chopped chives

recipe_ingredients.name: White Wine Vinegar divided- 2 cups + 3 tbsp

title: Chilli Garlic Omelette Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: As the name suggests, this omelette is made with fiery chilli and piquant garlic flavours. If you are someone with spicy taste palettes, this recipe is a worthwhile attempt.

recipe_directions.1: Break two eggs in a glass, whisk it properly
recipe_directions.2: Once done add chopped garlic, salt, chilli flakes and red chilli powder
recipe_directions.3: Mix everything again
recipe_directions.4: Heat a dollop of butter in a pan, pour the whisked egg batter, flip and cook the omelette from both sides
recipe_directions.5: You can also add a slice of cheese to give it a balanced taste
recipe_directions.6: Serve and enjoy!

title: Homemade Veg Grilled Sandwich Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description:
Homemade Veg Grilled Sandwich Recipe : This is an quick & easy sandwich recipe. To make this you need capsicum, onion, cucumber, carrot & paneer.Total Cook Time 15 mins Prep Time 05 mins Cook Time 10 mins Recipe Servings4EasyIngredients of Homemade Veg Grilled Sandwich1  onion1  boiled potato1/2  capsicum 1 small cucumber 1  carrot, grated100 gram paneer, grated4  cheese slices4 tbsp mayonnaise  to taste Salt  to taste Black pepper powderas required   Tomato sauceHow to Make Homemade Veg Grilled SandwichHideShow 
                                            Media
                                        1.Cut cucumber, onion and capsicum into this slices.2.Mix grated carrot and paneer. Add in mayonnaise.3.Smear 4 bread slices with some tomato sauce. Sprinkle salt and pepper.4.Place the veggies on all of them.5.Top it with grated veggie mix.6.Place cheese slice. Cover with another slice and grill with butter.Key Ingredients: onion, boiled potato, capsicum , cucumber , carrot, paneer, cheese slices, mayonnaise , Salt , Black pepper powder, Tomato sauce
                                        Tags:
                                    SandwichVeg Sandwich5 Share Recipe Share Recipe Facebook
                 Twitter
                 Reddit
                 
                    Snapchat

recipe_directions.1: Cut cucumber, onion and capsicum into this slices
recipe_directions.2: Mix grated carrot and paneer. Add in mayonnaise
recipe_directions.3: Smear 4 bread slices with some tomato sauce. Sprinkle salt and pepper
recipe_directions.4: Place the veggies on all of them
recipe_directions.5: Top it with grated veggie mix
recipe_directions.6: Place cheese slice. Cover with another slice and grill with butter

title: Green Onion and Mushroom Omelette Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: This recipe will let you make restaurant-style fluffy omelette at home! All you need to do is to prepare the stuffing of green onions and mushrooms and prepare the omelette base.

recipe_directions.1: Finely chop mushrooms in processor. Melt butter in medium skillet over medium-high heat
recipe_directions.2: Add mushrooms and onions; sauté for 3 minutes. Add vermouth and boil until evaporated, about 1 and a 1/2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper
recipe_directions.3: Whisk eggs, 1 tablespoon water, salt, and pepper in medium bowl to blend. Melt 1 teaspoon butter in small nonstick skillet over medium heat
recipe_directions.4: Add half of egg mixture. Stir with back of the fork until edges begin to set
recipe_directions.5: Cook until omelet is set, lifting edges with spatula to let uncooked egg flow underneath, about 2 minutes
recipe_directions.6: Spoon half of mushroom mixture down center of omelet. Fold both sides of omelet over filling and transfer to plate
recipe_directions.7: Repeat with remaining butter, egg mixture, and mushroom mixture. Sprinkle omelets with remaining onions

title: Scotch Egg And Broth Recipe
author: Chengfeng
description: Scotch Egg And Broth is a diffrent breakfast recipe which which made by boiled egg,lamb meat and  bread crumbs.

recipe_directions.1: Preparation methodPlace the eggs, still in their shells, in a pan of cold salted water.Place over a high heat and bring to the boil, then reduce the heat to simmer for exactly nine minutes
recipe_directions.2: Drain and cool the eggs under cold running water, then peel.Mix the lamb meat with the thyme, parsley and spring onion in a bowl and season well with salt and freshly ground black pepperDivide the lamb meat mixture into four and flatten each out on a clean surface into ovals about 12.5cm/long and 7.5cmPlace the seasoned flour onto a plate, and then dredge each boiled egg in the flour
recipe_directions.3: Place each onto a lamb meat, and then wrap the sausage meat around each egg. Make sure the coating is smooth and completely covers each egg.Dip each lamb meat-coated egg in the beaten egg, rolling to coat completely, then dip and roll into the breadcrumbs to completely cover
recipe_directions.4: Heat the oil in a deep heavy-bottomed pan, until a breadcrumb sizzles and turns brown when dropped into it.(CAUTION: hot oil can be dangerous
recipe_directions.5: Do not leave unattended.)Carefully place each scotches egg into the hot oil and deep-fries for 8-10 minutes, until golden and crisp and the lamb meat is completely cooked
recipe_directions.6: Carefully remove from the oil with a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen paper.And keep a sidePreparation methodIn heavy bottom pan, heat oil over medium-high heat; sauté onion, celery, carrot, turnip, garlic, bay leaf, salt and pepper for about 5 minutes or until softened
recipe_directions.7: Add barley; cook, stirring, for 1 minute.Add stock water; bring to boil. Add potato and thyme; cover and simmer for about 25 minutes or until vegetables and barley are tender
recipe_directions.8: Add lamb and parsley; simmer for 5 minutes. Discard bay leaf and thyme sprigs.Now scotch broth ready.Cut Scotch egg in to half and pour Scotch broth on top and serve hot

recipe_ingredients.name: To taste salt and freshly ground black pepper
plain flour, seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper
cooked mutton or lamb neck or stew meats

title: Buttermilk Scones Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: About Buttermilk Scones Recipe: Crisp outside, buttery and fluffy on the inside. These buttermilk scones are the perfect tea time option. Served with a delectable strawberry jam and whipped cream.

recipe_directions.1: In a big bowl add flour, bicarbonate soda, cream of tartar, butter along with caster sugar and mix
recipe_directions.2: While mixing keep adding some buttermilk, bring it all together, forming dough and take it out on a board
recipe_directions.3: Sprinkle some flour on the board and pat the dough to the thickness of your choice
recipe_directions.4: Cut small pieces of the dough with the cookie cutter and place them on a baking tray
recipe_directions.5: With the help of a brush touch up the pieces with the beaten egg
recipe_directions.6: Bake in an oven set at 220degree for about 10-12 minutes
recipe_directions.7: To Serve: Server the scones with some whipped cream and strawberry jam on the side

title: Pears in Saffron and Rose Syrup Recipe
author: Chengfeng
description: A delightful dessert, pears poached in a saffron and spice syrup, flavored with rose water.

recipe_directions.1: Mix water, sugar, rind and spice into a pan and cook over gentle flame
recipe_directions.2: Boil for five minutes
recipe_directions.3: Place prepared pears into hot syrup and poach until tender
recipe_directions.4: Remove fruit from syrup and arrange upright in a bowl
recipe_directions.5: If the spice syrup is thin, reduce it until it thickens
recipe_directions.6: Strain the hot syrup
recipe_directions.7: Sprinkle in the saffron strand and flavor with rose water
recipe_directions.8: Pour the syrup over the pears
recipe_directions.10: Decorate with almonds, mint leaves and silver leaf

title: Pound Cake Recipe
author: Chengfeng
description: About Pound Cake Recipe: Pound cake of British origin is traditionally made with a pound of each of it's main ingredients: flour, eggs, sugar, vanilla essense and butter.

recipe_directions.1: Mix butter, sugar, vanilla and eggs. Beat well together
recipe_directions.2: Mix salt and baking powder with the maida (flour) and add to the butter mixture
recipe_directions.3: Beat well together and transfer to prepared tin
recipe_directions.4: Bake in a pre-heated oven for 30-35 minutes

title: Tartare Sauce Recipe
author: Chengfeng
description:
Tartare Sauce: A creamy dipping sauce made with mayonnaise. Usually used with sea food, this dip is  loaded with flavor.Total Cook Time 15 mins Prep Time 05 mins Cook Time 10 mins Recipe Servings4EasyIngredients of Tartare Sauce  1 cup mayonnaise  1 onion-chopped fine  1 tomato-de-seeded and chopped fine  2 Tbsp chopped celeryHow to Make Tartare SauceHideShow 
                                            Media
                                        1.Mix all the ingredients together and serve.
                                        Tags:
                                    BritishDipNiru GuptaSauceTartar Sauce5 Share Recipe Share Recipe Facebook
                 Twitter
                 Reddit
                 
                    Snapchat

recipe_directions.1: Mix all the ingredients together and serve

title: Caribbean Rice Salad Recipe
author: California Prune Board
description: A fantastic salad to serve at a lunch buffet and with Indian food.

recipe_directions.1: Place all ingredients for salad in a bowl and toss gently
recipe_directions.2: Whisk French dressing with curry powder and salt, and pour over salad. Toss until well blended
recipe_directions.3: Taste and add more salt if required
recipe_directions.4: Serve in a pineapple shell or on a bed of lettuce
recipe_directions.5: Tip: You can use a mix of different rice as long as each one is cooked separately

recipe_ingredients.name: boiled rice (wild, brown or basmati or a mix)
finely chopped spring onions with some of the tender green

title: Chicken Chilli Gravy Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: Boneless chicken chunks marinated in soya sauce and ginger garlic paste, deep fried until crisp and seasoned in flavourful sauces. This chicken chilly gravy has a burst of flavours and tastes delicious. It is best served hot as an appetizer or with fried rice or noodles.

recipe_directions.1:
For Marination:

Take a large mixing bowl, add chicken chunks along with all the dry ingredients and soya sauce, ginger garlic paste, egg, corn flour, all-purpose flour. Mix well by using hands
recipe_directions.2: Set aside for 15-20 minutes
recipe_directions.3:
For Gravy:

Heat oil in a pan and deep fry all the chicken chunks. Keep aside. Now in the same pan, reduce the oil and Sautee ginger garlic paste
recipe_directions.4: Then add veggies like capsicum, onion and green chillies. Sautee again for about 2-3 minutes on medium flame
recipe_directions.5: Now lower the flame and corn flour slurry to make the gravy thick and consistent. Now, add all the sauces
recipe_directions.6: Stir it and give it a boil. Ps: You can add more water if you need extra gravy. Now, add fried chicken and mix everything well. Sprinkle spring onions and coriander leaves
recipe_directions.7: Serve and enjoy!

title: Mushroom Noodles Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: These mushroom noodles are super easy to make! It requires minimal chopping and is ready in minutes. With button mushrooms, spring onions, soy sauce, spice and noodles, you’ll get a delicious, Indo-Chinese noodles recipe that will not only impress your family but make them fight for a third serving!

recipe_directions.1: Start by boiling noodles al dante, and keep them aside
recipe_directions.2: Heat oil in a wok or kadai or a pan. On a low to medium heat, first add chopped garlic, chopped ginger and chopped green chilies. For a spicy hot tasting noodles, you can increase the quantity of green chilies
recipe_directions.3: Saute for a few seconds, then add chopped spring onions. Add both the white and green part. Reserve 2 tablespoon of the greens for garnish
recipe_directions.4: Stir and saute the spring onions till they turn translucent. Then add the sliced mushrooms
recipe_directions.5: Stir the mushrooms very well and saute them on a medium to high heat stirring occasionally. The mushrooms will leave water while cooking
recipe_directions.6: Continue to saute till all the water dries up and the mushrooms become light golden from the edges.Then add ground black pepper
recipe_directions.7: Add soy sauce and stir very well. Add the noodles. Add salt as required
recipe_directions.8: Stir and toss the noodles very well. Add rice vinegar or regular white vinegar. Stir and mix. Switch off the heat and lastly add the chopped spring onions greens
recipe_directions.9: Give a final stir and serve mushroom noodles plain or with dry veg manchurian or veg manchurian gravy or veg balls in hot garlic sauce

title: Sheng Jian Bao Recipe
author: Chengfeng
description: About Sheng Jian Bao : Sheng Jian Bao or raw fried buns is one of the signature dishes from Shanghai. It is filled with super juicy and incredibly flavorful pork wrapped in crispy pan fried layers. One bite of it awakens your taste with all the different flavours.

recipe_directions.1: Combine All purpose flour, cornstarch, instant yeast and sugar together. Stir to mix well
recipe_directions.2: Slowly pour into warm water and keep mixing the dough until tight. Form small dough flakes
recipe_directions.3: Pour in vegetable oil and keep mixing until the oil is absorbed
recipe_directions.4: Transfer the dough into a separate bowl and cover it with a plastic wrap. Let it rest
recipe_directions.5: Add soya sauce, salt, sugar and white pepper to the pork in a bowl. Mix it well until all the liquid is absorbed. Now, add green onions and sesame oil. Mix well
recipe_directions.6: Cut the dough strip into 12 pieces and gently use a circular motion to round up each strip then flatten it with your palm and roll it with a roller
recipe_directions.7: Add 1 tablespoon of the filling in the dough wrapper and start wrapping the bun in a shape of a momo. Repeat this step with other pieces of the dough
recipe_directions.8: Cook for 2-3 minutes over medium low heat and serve it hot with your favourite dip

title: Stuffed Eggplant with Schezwan Sauce Recipe
author: Penpa Tsering
description: About Stuffed Eggplant with Schezwan Sauce Recipe: A delicious Chinese dish with the goodness of mixed vegetables, eggplant, cottage cheese and a host of spices that would instantly spruce up the dish. Prepare this as a side dish at your next dinner party and keep your guests hooked!

recipe_directions.1: Stuff the eggplant with chopped vegetables and cottage cheese mixture
recipe_directions.2: Coat it with dry cornflour and deep fry
recipe_directions.3: Heat oil in wok. Add garlic, ginger, onion, oyster sauce, rice wine, chilli, vinegar, sichuan Pepper. Tomato ketchup and sauté it well
recipe_directions.4: Now add stock and adjust the seasoning and give a touch with corn flour
recipe_directions.5: At last add the fried eggplant, toss it well in sauce, sprinkle with spring onion and serve hot

title: Mapo Tofu with Spring Onion and Black Beans Recipe
author: Chengfeng
description: Traditionally made with beef or pork, this dish is thought to date back to the late nineteenth century. This vegetarian version made with tofu is equally sumptuous and has beautiful textures. You can adjust the spice to suit your own taste and serve it hot.

recipe_directions.1: 1. Heat cooking oil and Sichuan oil in wok or pan, put chili bean paste, spicy black bean, sauté it
recipe_directions.2: 2. Add ginger, garlic, chili powder and sauté for a while
recipe_directions.3: 3. Add dark soy and water
recipe_directions.4: 4. Put silken tofu, leeks, spring onion, and add sugar, let it boil for 2 minutes
recipe_directions.5: 5. Meanwhile take a stainless steel bowl put potato starch and water to prepare thickening starch
recipe_directions.6: 6. Adjust the thickening with potato starch and add it
recipe_directions.7: 7. Serve hot

title: Algerienne Fish Recipe
author: Chengfeng
description: Algerienne fish is a tangy French recipe. Fish fillets are marinated in lemon juice, baked and topped with a freshly made tomato sauce.

recipe_directions.1: Season the fish and squeeze lemon juice. Add parsley stalks
recipe_directions.2: Cover with foil and bake at 180 degrees for about 15 minutes
recipe_directions.3: While the fish bakes, fry onions in butter until soft. Add capsicums
recipe_directions.4: Season well and add garlic. Stir in tomatoes and paprika
recipe_directions.5: Cook well
recipe_directions.6: Spoon over this mix over the fish and garnish with parsley

title: French Pea Soup Recipe
author: Preah Narang
description: Go green with this light and lovely serving of pea soup. Goes best with a dollop of fresh cream!

recipe_directions.1: 1. Heat oil in a pan. Add the onion and saute till white
recipe_directions.2: 2. Now add the peas and saute for about 5 minutes
recipe_directions.3: 3. Add seasoning and vegetable stock
recipe_directions.4: 4. Give it a boil and simmer till the peas are cooked
recipe_directions.5: 5. Puree in a grinder. Heat again and serve hot topped with fresh cream

title: Low Fat French Onion Soup Recipe
author: Food Blogger Divya Burman
description: About Low fat French Onion Soup Recipe: An old world classic that never goes out of style. Only this time, it's low fat.

recipe_directions.1: Take a heavy bottomed pan
recipe_directions.2: Add butter and olive oil or spray
recipe_directions.3: When warm, add onions and garlic
recipe_directions.4: Now the idea is to keep cooking these onions on a slow flame.they should caramelize in about 20 minutes
recipe_directions.5: After adding these onions,cook on low for 10 minutes. Now add wine
recipe_directions.6: Once the onions are nicely caramelized, add the stock add let it come to a boil
recipe_directions.7: Taste and season with salt and pepper
recipe_directions.8: Put wholewheat bread in toaster and toast.now add grated cheese and let it melt till slightly brown in oven
recipe_directions.9: Add soup to soup bowl with a good amount of onions. Top with toast and serve

recipe_ingredients.name: A little olive oil or canola spray
A sprig or two of fresh or dry thyme
A piece of whole wheat toast baked in oven with grated gouda cheese till it browns slightly.

title: Coq Au Vin Recipe
author: Chengfeng
description: A French country classic - chicken in red wine with bacon and mushrooms.

recipe_directions.1: Brown chicken in hot butter.   Remove from pan and add bacon strips and saute until golden
recipe_directions.2: Replace chicken in pan and flambe with Cognac
recipe_directions.3: Pour in wine and stock
recipe_directions.4: Add tomato and garlic paste, bay leaf and thyme
recipe_directions.5: Cover pan and simmer for 25 minutes till chicken is tender.  Remove chicken pieces
recipe_directions.6: Let  sauce and thicken with 1 tea spoon of butter mixed with flour
recipe_directions.7: Add onions and mushrooms to the pan. Allow to heat and spoon over the chicken
recipe_directions.8: Serve with parsley potatoes and buttered peas

title: French Onion Soup with Cheese Souffle Recipe
author: Preah Narang
description: A classic French onion soup served with cheese souffle as light as a feather.

recipe_directions.1: Heat butter in a saucepan
recipe_directions.2: Add the flour and stir over low heat for some time to make a paste
recipe_directions.3: Pour in the milk, continue stirring and bring to boil making a smooth thick sauce
recipe_directions.4: Mix in the mustard, pepper and salt
recipe_directions.5: Switch off the gas and stir in the cheese
recipe_directions.6: Let the sauce cool and the beaten egg yolks gradually with a wooden spoon
recipe_directions.7: In another bowl, whisk the egg whites with a pinch of salt until stiff but not dry
recipe_directions.8: Fold it into the cheese sauce with a light hand
recipe_directions.9: Now pour the soup into a baking dish and place the toasts on top.     Pour the souffle mixture over the toasts. Sprinkle the bread crumbs, cheese and butter on top
recipe_directions.10: Heat the oven to 230 degrees and bake for about 20 minutes or until the souffle is well risen and golden in colour.     Serve immediately

title: Fenugreek and Lal Maat Crostini Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: Crusty bread sprinkled with olive oil, topped off with cottage cheese/tofu, fenugreek and laal maat leaves.

recipe_directions.1: Heat up some olive oil, throw in the cumin seeds, once they crackle add the diced onions and garlic
recipe_directions.2: Saute for a minute
recipe_directions.3: Add the red chilli flakes, diced peeled tomatoes and cook for another minute
recipe_directions.4: Toss in the blanched fenugreek and laal maat leaves
recipe_directions.5: Season to taste
recipe_directions.6: Slice the crusty bread into thick slices
recipe_directions.7: Brush with olive oil and grill or toast lightly
recipe_directions.8: Rub the slice with the garlic clove
recipe_directions.9: Spoon the mixture on to the bread
recipe_directions.10: Alternatively, you can add the tofu or cottage cheese into the mixture

title: Methi and Lotus Root Salad (Fenugreek & Lotus Root Salad) Recipe
author: Chengfeng
description: A healthy and delicious salad full of veggies with a tangy bit of lemon and spice along with the creamy layer of yoghurt.

recipe_directions.1: Blend methi, mint, sugar, chilli powder, chickpeas and oil together
recipe_directions.2: Season with salt and pepper. Sharpen with lemon juice
recipe_directions.3: Whisk in yoghurt and serve with salad
recipe_directions.4: Combine guavas and potatoes. Season

title: Greek Salad with Lemon Dressing Recipe
author: Ajay Chopra
description: Experience the freshness of herbs and veggies combined with a subtle drizzle of a refreshing dressing. This vibrant salad adds a splash of beautiful colours on your plate!

recipe_directions.1: Combine lemon juice, oregano, vinegar, garlic, salt, pepper powder, olive oil and parsley in a bowl and mix well
recipe_directions.2: Mix together cucumber, tomatoes, onions, capsicum, yellow and red bell pepper and olives in a bowl and toss well
recipe_directions.3: Pour the dressing on top, add lettuce and toss well
recipe_directions.4: Add feta cheese and mix gently
recipe_directions.5: Serve chilled

recipe_ingredients.name: medium cucumber, peeled and cut into triangles
medium onions, cut into quarters and layers separated
small green capsicum, cut into triangles
small yellow bell pepper, cut into triangles
small red bell pepper, cut into triangles

title: Classic Pasta Amatriciana Recipe
author: Abe
description: About Classic Pasta Amatriciana: An easy Italian tomato sauce, flavoured with crispy pancetta, sauteed onion and garlic, All’amatriciana is one of the most classical Italian pasta sauces. Believe us or not, this dish is heavenly and a must-try!

recipe_directions.1: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the diced bacon and cook, stirring frequently, until most of the fat has rendered into the pan and the bacon is crispy and caramelized slightly
recipe_directions.2: Add the diced onion and saute in the rendered fat for 3 to 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until the onions are soft and lightly caramelized
recipe_directions.3: Add the garlic and continue to saute for an addition 2 to 3 minutes, being careful to avoid burning the garlic or onion. Deglaze the pan with a tablespoon of water or red wine (optional), to remove any bits of crispy pancetta or bits from the bottom of the pan
recipe_directions.4: Add the tomato paste and the dried herbs and continue to cook, stirring frequently, over medium heat for an addition 1 to 2 minutes, or until the paste has thickened slightly
recipe_directions.5: Add the tomatoes,bring the sauce to a low simmer, and cook, stirring every few minutes, for 15 to 20 minutes. The sauce should be relatively thick and season to taste with salt. Place over low heat while you cook the pasta
recipe_directions.6: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to boil. Add the pasta and cook until al-dente. Reserve 1/2 to 3/4 cup of the pasta cooking water in a measuring cup, and then drain the pasta. Return the drained pasta back into the pot, add the sauce, thinning with pasta cooking water as necessary until the pasta is evenly coated
recipe_directions.7: Serve pasta with a topping of cherry tomatoes, olives ,extra virgin olive oil and some grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese

recipe_ingredients.name: parmigiano-reggiano cheese (plus more for serving), grated
dried Fusili pasta or any type available

title: Fettuccine Pomodoro Recipe
author: Swaminandan - Crowne Plaza Today New Delhi Okhla
description: About Fettuccine Pomodoro Recipe: A light, quick and easy pasta recipe, Fettuccine Pomodoro is a delicious dish for breakfast, brunch or kid's tiffin!

recipe_directions.1: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-low flame
recipe_directions.2: Cook onion, stirring occasionally, until soft, 10–12 minutes
recipe_directions.3: Add garlic and cook, stirring, about 3 minutes
recipe_directions.4: Add red pepper flakes and cook, stirring for a minute
recipe_directions.5: Increase heat to medium, add puréed tomatoes, and season lightly with salt
recipe_directions.6: Cook, stirring occasionally, until sauce thickens slightly and flavors have come together, 20–25 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in basil
recipe_directions.7: Set skillet over high heat and stir in reserved pasta cooking liquid to loosen sauce; bring to a boil
recipe_directions.8: Add pasta and cook, stirring, until sauce coats pasta and pasta is al dente
recipe_directions.9: Serve garnished with fresh basil sprig and olive powder

title: Lemon Chicken and Rocket Pasta Recipe
author: Surjan Singh
description: A recipe that you can share with your little one. A easy pasta with lime and lemony chicken chunks, fresh rocket leaves, pine nuts and cheese.

recipe_directions.1: In a saucepan, cook pasta in boiling, salted water for 10-12 minutes or until al dente. Drain and return pasta to saucepan
recipe_directions.2: In a medium bowl, combine remaining ingredients except Parmesan. Pour on pasta and toss
recipe_directions.3: To serve, top pasta with Parmesan

title: Pizza Panne Recipe
author: Ajay Chopra
description: Enjoy the crisp crunch of these paper thin snacks. Infused will garlic and subtle spices, you can team them up with whatever you desire or just go on a solo affair!

recipe_directions.1: Preheat oven at 180°C
recipe_directions.2: Place a silicon sheet on a baking tray
recipe_directions.3: Dissolve yeast and 1 1/2 tbsp sugar in 1/4 cup lukewarm water
recipe_directions.4: Combine 1/2 tsp salt and refined flour in a dough maker
recipe_directions.5: Add dissolved yeast mixture and knead into a soft dough using 3 1/2 tbsp olive oil and sufficient water
recipe_directions.6: Remove the dough from the maker and set aside for about 20 minutes
recipe_directions.7: Dust the worktop with little flour and spread the dough with your fingers
recipe_directions.8: Roll out into a large thin disc dusting with flour
recipe_directions.9: Spread the remaining olive oil on it
recipe_directions.10: Add torn fresh rosemary and chopped garlic on top and rub them well
recipe_directions.11: Cut the disc into long triangles and place them on the baking tray
recipe_directions.12: Put tray in preheated oven and bake for 8-10 minutes
recipe_directions.13: Remove from heat and serve immediately

title: Chicken Balls in Yakitori Sauce Recipe
author: Divya Burman
description: Lovely chicken mince balls steamed, then skewered and grilled and finally dipped in  a flavorful yakitori sauce.

recipe_directions.1: Take a thick bottomed pan and boil the mirin. When boiling, flame it till all alcohol burns off
recipe_directions.2: Mix soya, sugar, sake and add to the reduced mirin
recipe_directions.3: Cut the ginger, carrots, apple, celery into 1 inch cubes and throw in sauce
recipe_directions.4: Blanch the chicken bones in boiling water and add to sauce
recipe_directions.5: Cook 1 hour and thicken with cornflour
recipe_directions.6: Dip in yakitori sauce and serve

recipe_ingredients.name: oil, to grill the chicken balls

title: Japanese Soba Noodles Recipe
author: Plavaneeta Borah
description: Easy to make, these noodles taste delicious when stir-fried with teriyaki sauce. Throw in some veggies like mushrooms and carrots, caramalised pork strips (if you like) or just dunk them in dashi.

recipe_directions.1: Sift together the buckwheat, wheat flour and salt in a large mixing bowl
recipe_directions.2: Pour the water, a little at a time, and start rubbing the flours with your fingers. Work it well to bring it together to form a dough. Knead well, if it gets dry, add a little water and knead again
recipe_directions.3: Cover with a moist kitchen towel and keep it in the refrigerator for 30 minutes
recipe_directions.4: Take it out, and knead again. Divide into 4 balls, and dunk each ball in cornflour or starch before rolling it out. Use a big rolling pin, try to make the dough as thin as possible, but be careful as it may get a little crumbly and crack. A clever trick is to roll it as much as you can, then cut it into a rectangular sheet to remove the cracks. Keep sprinkling some corn flour to prevent it from sticking
recipe_directions.5: Layer all the rectangular sheets, making sure that you have sprinkled enough cornflour in between the layers. Using a large knife, carefully slice the dough to make thin strips
recipe_directions.6: Bring a large saucepan of water to a boil and cook the noodles in small batches for 2 minutes
recipe_directions.7: Heat oil in a wok, and stir-fry the onions for 3-4 minutes until softened. Add the mushrooms and carrots and toss well
recipe_directions.8: Add the noodles and teriyaki sauce and mix well. Let it cook for 2 minutes
recipe_directions.9: Season with salt and tip in the spring onions. Toss well and serve immediately

recipe_ingredients.name: A few sprigs spring onions, chopped

title: Mediterranean Watermelon Salad Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description:
Mediterranean Watermelon Salad Recipe: A quick serving of a refreshing salad with hydrating ingredients. Watermelon cubes, cucumber, tomatoes, lettuce and bell peppers drizzled with a light dressing.Total Cook Time 30 mins Prep Time 10 mins Cook Time 20 mins Recipe Servings2EasyIngredients of Mediterranean Watermelon Salad1 bowl  watermelon cubes2  Yellow bell peppers1 cup onions1 cup cucumber1 cup tomatoes  Pomegranate juice1 tbsp mustard paste2 tbsp olive oil A pinch of jeera powder A pinch of oregano 10-12  Olives  parsley, chopped  Romaine lettuce  Rocket lettuce  Flax seeds  Pistachios  Salt & pepperHow to Make Mediterranean Watermelon SaladHideShow 
                                            Media
                                        1.Pour pomegranate juice into a bowl.2.Add mustard paste, oregano, jeera powder, salt & pepper and whisk it well. Then add olive oil.3.In another bowl, put the watermelon cubes, yellow bell peppers, onions, cucumber, tomatoes and olives.4.Add parsley, salt and pepper. Mix them all well. Add lettuce leaves, flax seeds and pistachios. Add to the watermelon mixture. Toss it well.5.Serve chilled.Key Ingredients: watermelon cubes, Yellow bell peppers, onions, cucumber, tomatoes, Pomegranate juice, mustard paste, olive oil, jeera powder, oregano , Olives, parsley, Romaine lettuce, Rocket lettuce, Flax seeds, Pistachios, Salt & pepper
                                        Tags:
                                    Quick And EasySaladSummers5 Share Recipe Share Recipe Facebook
                 Twitter
                 Reddit
                 
                    Snapchat

recipe_directions.1: Pour pomegranate juice into a bowl
recipe_directions.2: Add mustard paste, oregano, jeera powder, salt & pepper and whisk it well. Then add olive oil
recipe_directions.3: In another bowl, put the watermelon cubes, yellow bell peppers, onions, cucumber, tomatoes and olives
recipe_directions.4: Add parsley, salt and pepper. Mix them all well. Add lettuce leaves, flax seeds and pistachios. Add to the watermelon mixture. Toss it well
recipe_directions.5: Serve chilled

title: Pasta with Roasted Mediterranean Veggies Recipe
author: NDTV Food
description: About Pasta with Roasted Mediterranean Veggies Recipe: Pasta, eggplants and yellow squash tossed with a light and herby dressing.

recipe_directions.1: In a mixer add garlic, basil, parsley, white wine vinegar, pinch of salt and extra virgin oil
recipe_directions.2: Blend till it turns into a nice paste
recipe_directions.3: Now get the veggies out of the oven and add the pasta, cherry tomatoes and olives to it
recipe_directions.4: Pour all the dressing on the pasta and give it a nice toss
recipe_directions.5: Add parsley and garnish with chives
recipe_directions.6: Sprinkle the yellow squash and eggplant with herbs, oregano, thyme, rosemary, basil, salt and pepper
recipe_directions.7: Put into the oven for 10 minutes for 250 degrees until cooked yet firm

title: Jowar Tacos with Spicy Chicken Filling Recipe
author: Plavaneeta Borah
description:
Jowar Tacos with Spicy Chicken Filling  : Quick to rustle up, make the tortilla from scratch with this simple recipe using jowar flour. Fill it up with spicy chicken, lots of crisp veggies and indulge!Total Cook Time 11 mins Prep Time 10 mins Cook Time 01 mins Recipe Servings2MediumIngredients of Jowar Tacos with Spicy Chicken FillingFor the Tacos  3/4 cup jowar flour  1/4 cup wheat flour  1 tsp baking powder  1/4 tsp salt  40 gram cold butterFor the Spicy Chicken Filling  1 chicken breast, cut into small cubes  1 onion, ground into paste  1 tsp fresh ginger paste  1 tsp fresh garlic paste  3 ripe tomatoes, chopped  1 tsp paprika  Salt to taste  1/2 tsp jaggery  1 tsp dried herbs, oregano  2 Tbsp oil  To Assemble  Crisp greens of your choice, sliced (lettuce, peppers, onions, corns)  Cream cheese or hung yoghurt  Barbecue sauce (optional)How to Make Jowar Tacos with Spicy Chicken FillingHideShow 
                                            Media
                                        For the Tacos1.Sift together jowar flour, wheat flour, salt and baking powder in a large mixing bowl. Add the butter cubes and start rubbing the mixture using your fingers until it resembles bread crumbs.2.Pour in some warm water, a little at a time, and continue kneading until it forms a soft dough. Wrap it with a cling-film and keep in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.3.Take the dough and knead it a little. Divide it into small balls, about 7-8, and using a rolling pin, shape them into circular discs. You may require some flour for dusting while rolling the balls.4.Heat a tawa and roast the tacos on both sides on medium flame until done. Then transfer to a pre-heated oven set at 150 degree C and bake for 5 minutes.5.Remove from the oven. Place the rolling pin at the centre of each taco and slight bend the edges.For the Spicy Chicken Filling1.In the meantime, make the filling. Heat oil in a large pan. Add the onion, garlic and ginger pastes and saute for 2-3 minutes on medium flame.2.Add the tomatoes and saute for 4-5 minutes until the mixture is nice and pulpy.3.Add paprika, jaggery and salt, and mix well. Tip in the chicken cubes, coat well in the mixture. Cover the pan with a lid and allow it to cook for 7-8 minutes until done.4.Mix in the oregano and check seasoning.5.To Assemble6.Load the tacos with the spicy chicken filling, fresh greens, cream cheese or hung yoghurt and serve immediately.Key Ingredients: 3/4 cup jowar flour, 1/4 cup wheat flour, 1 tsp baking powder, 1/4 tsp salt, 40 gram cold butter, 1 chicken breast, cut into small cubes, 1 onion, ground into paste, 1 tsp fresh ginger paste, 1 tsp fresh garlic paste, 3 ripe tomatoes, chopped, 1 tsp paprika, Salt to taste, 1 tsp dried herbs, oregano, 2 Tbsp oil, To Assemble, Crisp greens of your choice, sliced (lettuce, peppers, onions, corns), Cream cheese or hung yoghurt, Barbecue sauce (optional)
                                        Tags:
                                    ChickenJowarSnacksTacosWheat Flour4 Share Recipe Share Recipe Facebook
                 Twitter
                 Reddit
                 
                    Snapchat

recipe_directions.1: In the meantime, make the filling. Heat oil in a large pan. Add the onion, garlic and ginger pastes and saute for 2-3 minutes on medium flame
recipe_directions.2: Add the tomatoes and saute for 4-5 minutes until the mixture is nice and pulpy
recipe_directions.3: Add paprika, jaggery and salt, and mix well. Tip in the chicken cubes, coat well in the mixture. Cover the pan with a lid and allow it to cook for 7-8 minutes until done
recipe_directions.4: Mix in the oregano and check seasoning
recipe_directions.5: To Assemble
recipe_directions.6: Load the tacos with the spicy chicken filling, fresh greens, cream cheese or hung yoghurt and serve immediately

recipe_ingredients.name: chicken breast, cut into small cubes
Crisp greens of your choice, sliced (lettuce, peppers, onions, corns)

title: Chicken Tagine With Olives And Preserved Lemons Recipe
author: Farah Mohamed
description: Chicken Tagine is basically a traditional Moroccan dish. It is made with chicken and vegetables along with flavourful spices and served with any type of rice, preserved lemon and green olives.

recipe_directions.1: Mix garlic, saffron, ginger, paprika, cumin and turmeric together. If not using kosher chicken, add 1/2 teaspoon salt. Add pepper to taste. Rub chicken with mixture, cover, refrigerate and marinate 3 to 4 hours
recipe_directions.2: Heat oil in heavy skillet. Add chicken, and brown on all sides. Remove to platter. Add onions to skillet, and cook over medium-low heat about 15 minutes, until lightly browned
recipe_directions.3: Transfer to tagine, if you are using one, or leave in skillet. Add cinnamon stick
recipe_directions.4: Put chicken on onions and scatter with olives. Quarter the lemons, remove pulp and cut skin into strips. Then, scatter it  over the chicken. Mix stock along with lemon juice and pour it over chicken
recipe_directions.5: Cover tagine or skillet. Place over low heat, and cook about 30 minutes, until chicken is done. Scatter parsley on top, and serve

recipe_ingredients.name: pcs  Kalamata olives, pitted and halved
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

title: Spanish Valencia Prawns Recipe
author: Vijay Anand Bakshi
description: An effortless and classy preparation of prawns with paprika, red wine and lemon juice; served with a spicy dip.

recipe_directions.1: In a round bowl, mix paprika powder, red wine, shrimp powder, saffron, salt and vegetable oil. Whisk well
recipe_directions.2: Add fried onions and fried garlic. Check seasoning
recipe_directions.3: Peel, de-vein and clean prawns
recipe_directions.4: Add lemon juice. Marinate for 45 minutes
recipe_directions.5: Grill over moderate charcoal fire and serve hot with a medium spice dip

title: Young Jackfruit and Water Chestnut Thai Red Curry Recipe
author: Sudeep Sinha -  Alila Diwa Goa
description: About Young Jackfruit and Water Chestnut Thai Red Curry Recipe: A delicious, easy and quick meal for dinner or even the next morning's breakfast, this Thai red curry makes for a perfect dish for both. It's a comfort food that you just cannot miss, rich and full of vegetables. This recipe of Thai red curry has boiled jackfruit and water chestnut simmered in coconut milk along with jaggery to give a sweet-savoury flavour to the dish.

recipe_directions.1: Peel and cut the jackfruit into cubes, boil and set aside
recipe_directions.2: Using a wok, sauté lemon grass and galangal with oil
recipe_directions.3: Add red thai curry paste followed by boiled jack fruit and sliced water chestnut
recipe_directions.4: Simmer on low heat, add coconut milk and grated jaggery
recipe_directions.5: Add salt to taste and finish with fresh basil

title: Turkish Tulumba Recipe
author: Munavar Taher Peerzade - BKC DIVE
description: Tulumba is made of bits of fried dough, its the western rendition of the popular Indian Diwali sweet Shakar para, steeped in lots of lemon and sugar syrup(Chashni) and rose. It is a crispy, syrupy and ultra-sweet classic Turkish dessert and a popular street food. You’ll find it being served in many restaurants but it's sold mainly by street vendors who fry it up fresh on the spot and serve it warm. Enjoy this light sweet dish post dinner or as a snack.

recipe_directions.1: Take a vessel and add all the ingredients into the water and bring it to boil. Reduce the syrup till it becomes slightly viscous
recipe_directions.2: Once you are satisfied with the consistency, immerse the golden fried doughs into the syrup
recipe_directions.3: After 10 seconds remove the sticks and your Turkish Tulumba is ready to be served
recipe_directions.4:
Now add the corn flour to the dough and mix it well.
Ater that take a piping bag with a star nozzle and empty the entire dough inside the bag and prepare it for pipping
recipe_directions.5: Now take a vessel for deep frying, bring the oil to a temperature for deep frying the dough
recipe_directions.6: You can now pipe the dough into long sticks and deep fry the dough till it is golden brown

title: Vietnamese Cold Spring Rolls Recipe
author: Ritu Dalmia
description: About Vietnamese Cold Spring Rolls Recipe: Stuffed with loads of vegetables and shrimps these cold spring rolls are best served with a chilly sauce and peanuts dip. Serve it as snacks at a dinner party or on a Sunday brunch with friends and family.

recipe_directions.1: Cook the noodle as per the packet instruction and keep aside
recipe_directions.2: Make sure all veggies and herbs are cleaned, dried, and set out before you start. Dip a sheet of rice paper wrapper into water very quickly, no longer than a second or two (or they will get too soggy) and lay flat on a work surface
recipe_directions.3: On one edge, lay a small handful of noodles, some shrimp, some coriander and mint leaves, a lettuce leaf, some cucumber strips carrot and spring onion and bean sprouts, all to taste but don't over stuff
recipe_directions.4: Carefully start to roll up, burrito style, tucking in the sides, then continue to roll up but not too tightly or the spring roll will split
recipe_directions.5: These rolls will be thicker than the typical Chinese-style fried spring rolls
recipe_directions.6: Combine a few spoon full of Hoisin sauce and chilly sauce with some chopped peanuts to use as a dipping sauce. I like to put a few drops of sauce even inside the stuffing, but that entirely is up to you
recipe_directions.7: Serve immediately - these do not keep and will harden up in the fridge, so it is best to make just as many as you plan to serve

recipe_ingredients.name: packet  clear edible rice paper sheets
head  lettuce (washed and separated into leaves)
cucumber (cut into very, very thin strips), peeled
packet  vermicelli rice noodles, prepared according to package directions
to taste Hoisin sauce and sweet chilly sauce

title: Schezwan paneer Recipe
author: Chengfeng
description: Crispy deep fried paneer along with variety of sauce and spices make this recipe a perfect Indo-chinese appetizer. .

recipe_directions.1: Soak Dried red chillies in water for 10 mins then grind coarsely
recipe_directions.2: In a bowl, add cornflour, some salt, 1tspn black pepper, water and prepare a slurry to marinate paneer for atleast 10 mins
recipe_directions.3: After 10 mins shallow fry the paneer and keep it aside. Don’t throw the marinade, we will need this for the gravy
recipe_directions.4: In a pan heat some oil, add chopped ginger garlic and sautee for a while
recipe_directions.5: Add spring onions, Chilly paste and schezwan peppercorns and let it cook for some time
recipe_directions.6: To the chilli paste, add vinegar and soy sauce according to your liking. Then cook until the masala leaves some oil on the sides
recipe_directions.7: Add diced onions and Capsicum and stir
recipe_directions.8: Get the remaining marinade, add water to it and add this to the pan. Let is cook and thicken to your desired consistency
recipe_directions.9: Just 2 mins before it reaches your desired consistency, toss in the paneer and adjust salt and pepper according to your liking
recipe_directions.10: Let it simmer for a while and your Schezwan paneer is ready

title: Simrana G & T Recipe Recipe
author: Biswajit Biswas
description: Blue pea flower infused gin, topped with fresh lime juice and lavender. A great spin to the classic gin and tonic.

recipe_directions.1: Take a shaker, and put the blue pea flower tea-infused gin & fresh lime juice top-up with tonic water, and mix it well
recipe_directions.2: To pour the cocktail take a glass and put the cocktail in
recipe_directions.3: For garnishing put some lavender flowers on it

recipe_ingredients.name: Blue pea flower tea infused gin

title: Thandai Macaron Recipe
author: Rachel Goenka
description: The very thought of soul-soothing drinks instantly remind us of Thandai. Here we bring you a modern and unique twist to the the Thandai recipe.

recipe_directions.1: Beat the butter until its softened and fluffy. Add white chocolate and thandai flavour and mix it well
recipe_directions.2: Place approximately half a table spoon of the filling on the flat side of macaron and sandwich together
recipe_directions.3: Before serving refrigerate the macarons for a couple of hours
recipe_directions.4: Gently tap the baking sheet few times on the work surface to break any air bubbles then leave it to dry for 20 minutes
recipe_directions.5: Bake the macaron at 130 degrees for 24 minutes
recipe_directions.6: Do not remove the macarons until they are cold or you will break them
